  3. As One

Min

Crystal

Introduction

As One is a female R&B duo under Brand New Music. They debuted in November 1999 with the album Day By Day. On May 31, 2017, Brand New Music announced the duo would be ending their music promotions for the time being to focus on their personal lives. Their last single, "Goodbye for Now", was released on June 5, 2017.

They returned on December 15, 2019, with the special single "It's Ok To Not Be Ok" to commemorate their 20th anniversary, followed by another single "February 29th" in 2020. They resumed group activities again the following year, releasing "Something Like A Miracle" on October 23, 2023 and "Winter Wonderland" on December 14, 2023. On April 18, 2024, they released their latest single "Better".
